greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: absolute values of odd-numbered rows of A159041.
formula: Infinite sum on a generalized Euler numbers/ polynomial scaled generating function:
mathematica: Clear[m, n, t, x, y, a]
a = Table[ CoefficientList[FullSimplify[ExpandAll[((1 - y)^(n + 1)/(2*y))*n!*SeriesCoefficient[ Series[f[t, y], {t, 0, 30}], n]]], y], {n, 2, 10, 2}]
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Dec 15 2009
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 10 2013
